meanings.definition: The counting backward in fixed units to indicate the time remaining before an event.
meanings.sent1: The countdowns to New Year's Eve always make me excited.
meanings.sent2: The countdowns to the rocket launch were displayed on the big screen.
meanings.sent3: The countdowns to dinner time felt like forever when I was hungry.
meanings.sent4: The countdowns to the end of the school day were like a race against time.
meanings.sent5: The countdowns to the movie premiere built up anticipation among the fans.

meanings.sent1: She enjoyed participating in the countdowns for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The countdowns at the sporting event added to the excitement.
meanings.sent3: The countdowns during the game made everyone cheer louder.
meanings.sent4: The countdowns in the classroom helped students prepare for exams.
meanings.sent5: The countdowns on the clock signaled the start of the race.
